title: Test Action concept (ELIXIR-EXCELERATE WP2 Benchmarking schemas)

_id.title: The unique id of the test action.

_schema.title: The JSON schema absolute URI. It must match the value of 'id' in the JSON schema

tool_id.title: The tool id which takes the input and reference datasets declared in the challenge

action_type.title:
Test Event = Input + Tool -> Participant Data
Metrics event = Participant Data + Metrics -> Assessment Data
Statistics event = Assessment Data + Metrics -> Challenge Data

received_datasets.title: The output, report and metrics datasets received for this test action

dataset_id.title: A received dataset, with this id

role.title: The kind of dataset received for this action (report, output, metrics)

received.title: Reception date of the dataset (redundant, as the output dataset already has this date)

challenge_id.title: The id of the challenge where this test action was generated

test_contact_ids.title: The test action contact id(s), i.e. the runners of the tool and depositors of the results

dates.title: Relevant dates for this test action

creation.title: Creation date of the test action

modification.title: Last modification date of the test action

public.title: The date when this test action becomes public

metadata.title: Relevant metadata used to call the tool
